Utilities

rxrmask.utils.compute_adaptive_layer_segmentation(layers, energy_eV, precision=1e-06)[source]

Adaptive layer segmentation based on optical constant variation.

Groups layers with similar optical properties to reduce computation.

Parameters:

  • layers (List[Layer]) – List of layers with precomputed optical properties.

  • energy_eV (float) – Energy at which optical constants were computed.

  • precision (float) – Threshold for optical constant variation.

Returns:

Layer boundary indices for segmentation.

Return type:

List[int]

rxrmask.utils.get_density_profile_from_element_data(element_data, layer_thickness_params, atoms, step=0.1)[source]

Calculate density profiles from element data and layer parameters.

Parameters:

  • element_data – Element data dictionary with parameters.

  • layer_thickness_params – Layer thickness parameters.

  • atoms – Atom objects dictionary.

  • step (float) – Depth step size for profile calculation.

Returns:

(z_positions, density_profiles, magnetic_density_profiles, layer_positions).

Return type:

tuple
